golem.util.validation

Class ValidationContext

  • golem.util.validation.ValidationContext

  • public class ValidationContext

    A lambda receiver with state and convenience methods for validating a group of matrices.

    In general there is no reason to instantiate this directly, instead @see validate(fn) for example usage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ValidationContext()
      A lambda receiver with state and convenience methods for validating a group of matrices.

        A lambda receiver with state and convenience methods for validating a group of matrices.

        In general there is no reason to instantiate this directly, instead @see validate(fn) for example usage.

      • invoke

        public ValidationContext invoke(Matrix<java.lang.Double> $receiver,
                                kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super golem.util.validation.ValidationContext,kotlin.Unit> fn)

        Execute the given fn (which should contain validation rules) against the given matrix.

        In general it is preferable to use the other verison of this function that lets you specify a name. All matrices that are validated with this method will appear in the error message with the name "matrix"

      • invoke

        public ValidationContext invoke(Matrix<java.lang.Double> $receiver,
                                java.lang.String name,
                                kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super golem.util.validation.ValidationContext,kotlin.Unit> fn)

        Execute the given fn (which should contain validation rules) against the given matrix with the given name.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the matrix to report in validation error messages.

      • validate

        public void validate()

        Check declared matrices against any rules that have been added with addValidator.

      • validate

        public void validate(kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super golem.util.validation.ValidationContext,kotlin.Unit> fn)

        Check declared matrices against any rules that have been added with addValidator, after running the given callback.

        Parameters:
        fn - A function to execute before validating.
